channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Sister Briege McKenna continues her conversation about healing and explains why Jesus wants us to experience His healing power today just like the people did in His time. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Choices We Face
channel.desc: Patti Mansfield presents St. Elena Guerra, an apostle of the Holy Spirit, and shares the saint?s call to write Pope Leo XIII and encourage Catholics to live a perennial Pentecost. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Freedom And Authority
channel.desc: Fr. Dubay talks about the types of authority in this episode, how they can be used, and what not to do. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Papal Audience With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: From the Vatican, Pope Leo XIV delivers his weekly address to the faithful. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fathers For Good
channel.desc: Fr. Francis Gustilo and Frank Padilla discuss spiritual conversion and how it produces real changes in the lives of those who follow Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford explains that as God's forgiveness to us is boundless if we ask, so should ours be to our neighbors. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Ryan Penny and his panel of influencers discuss the ways humor can draw people closer to their faith in a world that desperately needs the Good News and a good laugh. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Conversation
channel.desc: Bernadette Goulding, national coordinator and co-founder of Rachel?s Vineyard Ireland, speaks about her experience with abortion and Rachel?s Vineyard healing retreat ministries. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Adventure Catechism
channel.desc: From an early age, children learn their prayers by heart. But prayer also invites us into a relationship with God. Jesus taught the Disciples how to pray the Our Father, which embodies His will for His children. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Lukas Storyteller
channel.desc: When the friends attend a camp, they soon begin to miss the comforts of their home. Inspired by the heroic life of St. Maximilian Kolbe, Lukas helps them understand they should always be grateful for what they have. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Children's Rosary
channel.desc: Children gather to pray and learn more about the five Luminous Mysteries of the Rosary: Christ?s Baptism, the Wedding Feast at Cana, the Proclamation of the Kingdom, the Transfiguration, and the Institution of the Eucharist. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Luminous Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer and Doug Keck speak about the Miracle of the Sun at Fatima and some of the widely discussed possible explanations for the event?s occurrence. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, examines the Holy Spirit?s role and how it works throughout all seven sacraments, not just Confirmation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch welcomes Fr. Shenan Boquet to discuss the beauty of marriage, children, and how dedicated family life can counter the problems of the decline in global fertility rates. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Baptism of Christ, Wedding at Cana, Proclamation of the Kingdom, Transfiguration and Institution of the Eucharist help us to receive the graces of salvation from Christ through Mary's intercession. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grab Your Catechism With Fr. Connor
channel.desc: Fr. Charles Connor answers why the Catechism recognizes sin as an offense against both God and reason. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints For Today
channel.desc: Father John Horgan explores the life of Blessed James Kern and his fervent love of the priesthood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Philosophers' Bench
channel.desc: Although the two are often associated, Dr. Kreeft and Dr. Howard explain that the definition of morality extends beyond its usual equation with modesty. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: Having lost loved ones, these families explain how the Lord helped them choose to trust in Him rather than blame each other. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch welcomes Fr. Shenan Boquet to discuss the beauty of marriage, children, and how dedicated family life can counter the problems of the decline in global fertility rates. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! The Conversation
channel.desc: Tony Foy speaks about the work of NET Ministries which invites young people from around the world to train and serve as missionary teams in parishes and schools across Ireland. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Fr. Chris Alar, MIC is back to discuss ways in which to prayerfully respond to the topic of suicide and how to make sense out of such a difficult subject. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer and Doug Keck speak about the Miracle of the Sun at Fatima and some of the widely discussed possible explanations for the event?s occurrence. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Palestine : Quand Le Fils De L'homme Vient
channel.desc: La bande de Gaza est longue de 41 km et large de 10 km, bord?e par la mer M?diterran?e, Isra?l et l'?gypte. Elle est aujourd'hui dirig?e par le groupe islamiste militant Hamas. Lorsque le Hamas a pris le pouvoir ? Gaza, Isra?l et l'?gypte ont impos? un blocus sur le territoire, qui h?berge 2 millions de personnes. Plus de 40 % ont moins de 15 ans et le ch?mage des jeunes s'?l?ve ? plus de 60 %. Certains qualifient la bande de Gaza comme la plus grande prison au monde. Le documentaire se penche sur les r?alit?s de Gaza aujourd'hui ? et le r?le vital de la minorit? chr?tienne au service de son prochain. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris explains the importance of the seven Sacraments as the only guaranteed way that we receive grace needed for salvation. Also, get to know the Heart of Mary House Hospice. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Mary Theresa Dudzik
channel.desc: The Miracle Hunter investigates the canonization cause of Mother Mary Theresa Dudzik, a Polish immigrant who founded her own order of nuns to care for the poor, elderly and abandoned. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Precious Blood Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about seeking justice while admitting personal need for mercy, whether Catholics accept the Septuagint, and how sacraments are efficacious. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Speed Skater Bonnie Blair joins host Bob Dolan to talk about her career, which included winning four gold Olympic medals and about her faith and her volunteer work for Catholic Relief Services. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica adds her insight into the topic of virtue, and all the joys it brings with it. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Joshua Mazrin joins to share a lesser-known aspect of a modern day saint, St. Maximilian Kolbe - his deep love and theology for the Blessed Mother, whom he called The Immaculata. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: Every week, Abigail Galv?n and a team of pro-life experts shine the light of truth on abortion, euthanasia, assisted suicide, and the culture of death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Walking Through Time: Catholic London
channel.desc: Joanna visits London Bridge, Shakespeare's Globe Theatre and where the ancient church of St. Mary Overie stood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Holocaust Symphony No. 3
channel.desc: World-renowned pianist and composer Richard Nanes performs a powerful meditation of the Holocaust. Martin Bookspan delivers a commentary. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: The expression of love through hearing, vision, and touch, and how to relate these to all aspects of our spiritual growth. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: "Miracle Hunter" Michael O'Neill travels to Paris where the Virgin Mary appeared to St. Catherine Laboure in 1830, resulting in the most famous and widespread Catholic medal in circulation, the Miraculous Medal. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Conversation
channel.desc: Tony Foy speaks about the work of NET Ministries which invites young people from around the world to train and serve as missionary teams in parishes and schools across Ireland. (30 minutes).
